rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the entrance direction. It features a clear path from the main door and connects directly to the living areas.
Spacious living area with natural lighting and ventilation. Designed per Vastu guidelines for energy flow and communal activities.
Functional kitchen located in the southeast corner to promote positive energies as suggested by Vastu principles. Includes modern appliances and ample counter space.
Prime bedroom positioned in the southwest sector with a view of open spaces to enhance relaxation and privacy, following Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom aligned with the northeast area for balance in energy flow.
Third bedroom located in the northwest sector to maintain harmony and Vastu compliance.
Designated guest room positioned for optimal energy flow according to Vastu principles.
A dedicated space in the northeast zone to foster creativity and productivity while respecting Vastu norms. Sound insulation and natural light are prioritized.
Quiet study area located near the living room in the east to maximize concentration and energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Entertainment space integrated into the family living areas. The design considers acoustics and seating arrangement in alignment with Vastu, ensuring a balanced ambiance.
Modern bathroom installed near the bedrooms to optimize convenience while adhering to local building norms and ensuring proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: The primary entrance is positioned on the east side to align with auspicious Vastu principles and ensure energy flow into the home.
Additional access point provided for ease of entry and exit. Its placement is chosen to maintain balance in energy distribution as per Vastu guidelines.
